titles.title: Expressing support for starting and growing families through in vitro fertilization.
Expressing support for starting and growing families through in vitro fertilization.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for in vitro fertilization (IVF) and for state laws and regulations that establish health, safety, and ethical standards for medical facilities that offer IVF and other assisted reproductive technologies.
